meanings.definition: A color between red and blue
meanings.sent1: The sky at sunset displayed beautiful purples.
meanings.sent2: She painted her room in various shades of purples.
meanings.sent3: The artist mixed red and blue to create stunning purples on the canvas.
meanings.sent4: The purples of the flowers in the garden seemed to dance in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The purples of the sunset painted the horizon in a mesmerizing display.

meanings.sent1: The bruise slowly purples over time.
meanings.sent2: The cold made her fingers purples.
meanings.sent3: The potion unexpectedly purples the liquid in the cauldron.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds purples as the rain approached.
meanings.sent5: The dye begins to purple the fabric in the wash.

meanings.definition: A type of flowering plant with purple flowers
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with lavenders and other purples.
meanings.sent2: She received a bouquet of purples for her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the purples in the field.
meanings.sent4: The purples in the park added a lovely touch to the scenery.
meanings.sent5: The purples in her garden attracted butterflies of all colors.
